Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp

Class JSPPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp.JSPPage
  • public class JSPPage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a parsed JSP page as an abstract syntax tree (AST). This is the root node of the JSP structure containing all page directives, elements, and content.

    A JSPPage contains:

    • Page directives (imports, content type, etc.)
    • Tag library directives
    • JSP elements (scriptlets, expressions, declarations)
    • HTML/XML content
    • Custom tag usage
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
